heading: This Evening
text: Additional rain, mixing with snow through the Adirondacks and Champlain Valley, then east into VT later. Blustery. Light winds, becoming north to northwest near 10 mph from the Green Mountains west.

heading: Tonight
text: Snow showers likely through the northern mountains, a dusting to an inch, scattered in northern valleys and southern mountains. Partial clearing in southern valleys. Lows in the low to mid 20s north, upper teens in the Adirondacks. Winds northwest near 10 mph.

heading: Tuesday (Veterans Day)
text: Some morning sun south, then mostly cloudy. Scattered snow showers north, south through the mountains, most frequently in the Adirondacks and northern Greens. Blustery and cold. Highs in the upper 20s to low 30s north, and low to mid 30s south. West winds increasing to 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 30 mph.
